attributes.title: Terrible App Do Not Download
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get updates about the campaign but as soon as I opened it my phone kept completely crashing and I kept receiving messages from unknown callers trying to scam me. I feel like the app is also collecting all of my data and I am extremely worried that I may need to get a new phone.  Do not download this app!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely TERRIIBLEE
attributes.review: I’ve had the worst experience with this app I swear it coulda took me out to dinner first before asking me to move in jeez I would never eat another table again like what the hell is this Starbucks ughh atp you should really wash y’all behinds and stand in the counter my birds keep screaming they will never try this wax again but I said all this to say that this app took me to court and I WON

attributes.title: poor quality
attributes.review: When i opened this app, it was asking me for some private information that i didn’t want to be shared. Also, my phone never goes slowly but when i was using this app it had failed to respond to things i wanted to do. Furthermore, this has to be the most confusing app i have ever used in my entire lifetime.

attributes.title: Hate it
attributes.review: I hate this app it goes really really slow a little chilly so it says that it is not have any Wi-Fi and my Wi-Fi is perfect I don’t know it’s wrong but yeah it’s really really slow I recommend not to get it because it goes really slow it was really slow and I can’t even do anything on it like I don’t like it at all please don’t get this I don’t recommend it

attributes.title: AWFUL APP
attributes.review: so I downloaded this “amazing” app to support our ‘beautiful’ president. And when I downloaded it, my pet corn flew away all by itself. So I took my shrimps to target to get some vegetables to help find my pet corn (I never found it) and my shrimps died. So I went to moe’s to get some tacos and their ice cream machine was broken. I decided after all of that I’d just delete this app. Thank you for your time.

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: Functionality is horrible, no sign of intelligent life forms to be found. This app made all my plants die in two days and is the reason I wake up with existential dread every single day. I would not recommend this to anybody. Those who live in ignorance live in bliss and make everyone else want to not live, all of a sudden I was racist after downloading this app.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: Please don’t get it! This is just the absolute worst and i’m not just saying that! i mean it, first of all, it was just terrible to use, second of all it glitches so so so much like to the point where i want to break my phone it’s that annoying. Last but not least, it will just randomly have a white screen, and boot me out. this is the worst app ever.

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible !!!
attributes.review: Worst app to have ever been made!!! Would not load and every time I would open the app it would automatically force close!! Whenever I could actually get it open it would freeze so I could not actually use the app. Can’t believe apple endorses such bad apps! Would absolutely never download or use again!!!

attributes.title: What da heck 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I was enjoying this until I saw a picture with the orange man, I need time to process what this man dingle berry is so microscopic , sir are u eating healthy ? Cuz I think you need to lose some what I can barely see that thing 😔 no worrries sir some one with billions of dollars doesn’t need a big mushroom tip when his wife looks like a go wrong plastic surgery operation, anyways free my homie big McChicken , trump locked him up

attributes.title: this app is trash, garbage, basura throw it away🤚🏼🤮
attributes.review: ok so hi, my name is Jennifer and i own a cat and im 51 that’s not the point but neways i downloaded this app cause i thought it was helpful by making trump not be president no mo but i somehow got the corona and ima die and it’s this apps fault, i almost got ran over by a truck right after i downloaded this, it’s bad luck. chile where is the manager cuz this app not it also trump 2020🇺🇸 in a graveyard😻✨❤️🙈
